title.narrative: Support to World Bank SEA-MAP Project

description.narrative: The grant will be used to (1) Provide advice and analysis related to the design of the Plastic Circularity Fund under the Southeast Asia Regional Program on Combat Marine Plastics (SEA-MaP), (2) Carry out a study to identify best practices for plastics standards, and (3) Carry out regional stakeholder consultations and analytical work to build on a World Bank internal options paper on the regional plastic waste trade.

The grant will be used to (1) Provide advice and analysis related to the design of the Plastic Circularity Fund under the Southeast Asia Regional Program on Combat Marine Plastics (SEA-MaP), (2) Carry out a study to identify best practices for plastics standards, and (3) Carry out regional stakeholder consultations and analytical work to build on a World Bank internal options paper on the regional plastic waste trade.

mailing-address.narrative: Menara Rajawali, 25th Floor, Mega Kuningan Lot 5.1
